name: The man that pulled
description:
The man that pulled is a short game that is all about order. Your job is to continue the legacy of The man that pulled, by pulling rocks back to their place. If you pull all the rocks back to their place you will please The man that pulled. So please, please him.

Story 

Once upon a time, there lived a man whose sole mission was to push the overturned or misplaced rocks back into position. Now after he's gone, you're job is to carry out his legacy by doing the same. So go forth and continue your journey by pulling back the rocks to their rightful place.

Controls

arrow keys or WASD to move 

X to action 

Z to undo

R to restart

Credits

Game designed by: Flying Zucchini

Sound effects by: Puzzle script

Game-engine/software used: Puzzle script

Graphics by: Flying Zucchini
